706051f-a.title: Brooklyn: New York Avenue - Clarkson Avenue
706051f-a.text:
New York Ave., north side, east of Clarkson Ave. In the center is the Chapel of the Poor-farm in the Kings County Hospital's grounds; the larg3
building on the left is on Clarkson Ave.
March 1929.
Tugene L. Armbruster Collection.
706051f-a.folder: New York Avenue & Clarkson Avenue, Brooklyn, NY
